definition[0]: a unilateral action or decision is done by only one of the groups involved in a situation
note[0]: unilateral disarmament (=when one country gets rid of its own nuclear weapons without waiting for other countries to do the same)
definition[1]: a unilateral action or decision is done or made by only one of the groups involved in a situation
example[1]: In the 19th-century, Britain announced and largely followed a policy of unilateral free trade.
